description: This value set includes sample Consent Except Type codes.
name: Consent Except Type Codes

text.div:
Consent Except Type Codes

This value set includes sample Consent Except Type codes.

Copyright Statement: This is an example set.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/consentexcepttypecodes defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
authorized-action Authorize a specified action.
forbidden-action Forbid a specific thing.
withhold-authored-by Withhold all data authored by specified actor entity.
release-authored-by Withhold all data authored by specified actor entity.
withhold-identified-object-and-related Withhold the identified object and any other resources that are related to this object.
release-identified-object-and-related Withhold the identified object and any other resources that are related to this object.
withhold-object-type Withold specific object types.
release-object-type Withold specific object types.
withhold-from Withhold all data from specified actor entity.
release-to Withhold all data from specified actor entity.
withhold-timeframe Withhold all data authored during a timeframe.
release-timeframe Withhold all data authored durng a timeframe.
